</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[addWeapon]] weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle to add the weapon to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - weapon class name. See the topic [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>An_2 [[addMagazine]] "100Rnd_762x51_M240";
